title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 25.1 - Applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 25.1 - Applications

State Regulations

Any person wishing to be heard at a public meeting of the

Board of Regents shall submit a written request to that effect at least 10 days
in advance of the date of the meeting at which he wishes to be heard. Such
request shall be addressed to the Commissioner of Education, State Education

Building, Albany, New York, and shall clearly state: (a) the subject matter on which the applicant
wishes to be heard; (b) the purpose
of the proposed appearance; (c) the
amount of time requested for such appearance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
25.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
